comment: Not a good night . Got up feeling leaden . Struggling to do anything , too much to do . And I have to spend the day surrounded on all sides by noisy humans .. If I fail to act normally I'll be subjected to nagging enquiries of ' You alright ? ' ' You alright ? ' ' You alright ? '

comment: Got through the first hour , took a couple of day's leave now . Waves of anxiety breaking me open . Back home OK . Breathing , peacefulness , letting it come and flow away again .
